📌強化策略 (3月起啟用)

✅全民 > 組社團 + 組工會 + 開公司
✅專業人士 > 登記專業界別
✅本身有BR > 直接登記商界
✅手足 > 掃黃店

🔺組社團 (文化界)
1. 齊集三人，須有相關文化資歷證明
2. 準備社團資料 - 宗旨/ 規章/ 擬辦活動
3. 準備個人資料 - 身分證副本/ 住址+會址證明 (3個月內)(銀行/水電煤單據)
4. 約組員出黎，互簽名，互交換文件
5. 寄出去 /親身交到警總 Done!
https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/01/blog-post_33.html

🔺組工會 (勞工界)
- 已確認核實，即使工會審批時間長短
- 只要你5月2日前提交申請, 就可以趕及2021特首選委🔥

組隊神器 7起 > https://7up.hkpetitions.com
無敵Q&A > https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/01/blog-post_12.html

🔺開公司 (萬能界)
- 帶身份證去灣仔税局搞，俾$250，30分鐘搞掂 @businessfrontier
- 輕量級 > 紡織界 $61/ 體育界 $2000/ 出版界 $1140 (撳個掣就得)
- 重量級 > 商界 $3900/ 工業界 $2970/ 零售界 $1180/ 僱主聯合會 $4800
- 集中首選 > 進出口界 $240+1320 (1年以上BR+商業地址）
https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/03/blog-post_57.html

🔺申請進出口牌 (進出口界）
只要有一年以上BR同埋商業地址，唔理你做咩生意，都可以向海關申請進出口牌，立即成為進出口界公司選民
Telegram: http://t.me/exportfrontier
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exportfrontier/

🔺掃黃店 (飲食界、零售界)
組隊幫手登記 > https://forms.gle/am8LThtTL9r6joL17
掃黃店進度表 > https://bit.ly/3cEJGz6
黃店名單 > https://www.hkshoplist.com/select.php

🔺每個香港人都可以拎三票
1. 地區個人票 (地方選區有得投）
2. 功能組別個人票 (正常人係超區)
3. 功能組別團體票(不可跟2同一界別)

例子
地方選區：香港島
功能界別(個人票)：超級區議會
功能界別(團體票)：飲食界

事實上你開到一個工會人地就開到十個 同埋如果你識英文嘅話可以睇下陳文敏點寫:
"While the composition of the Election Committee appears at its face value broadly representative, this is far from the case. Apart from the 39 members of the LegCo who are returned by universal suffrage, the remaining members of the Election Committee are returned by a small number of voters. The size of the voters of each subsector is an average about 1,000, making a total size of the voters less than 240,000. Many of the subsectors comprise only corporate voters, or a majority of corporate voters, and the criteria to become a voter are entirely unclear. Thus, for example, the Fisheries and Agricultural subsector returns a total of 60 members to the Election Committee. The subsector comprises about 83 voters, all of whom are organizations. Many may look to have the same or very similar memberships, such as Aberdeen Fisherman Friendship Association, Aberdeen Fisherwomen Association, Hong Kong Fishermen’s Association and Hong Kong and Kowloon Fishermen Association Ltd. There is no clear procedure of how an organization becomes a voter. Thus, it comes as no surprise that there is no confidence that this body would be representative and would make a nomination that could represent the general view of the public. The contrive membership also means that it could easily be manipulated."

"While the composition of the Election Committee appears at its face value broadly representative, this is far from the case. There is no clear procedure of how an organization becomes a voter. Thus, it comes as no surprise that there is no confidence that this body would be representative and would make a nomination that could represent the general view of the public. 事實上你開到一個工會人地就開到十個 同埋如果你識英文嘅話可以睇下陳文敏點寫:
"While the composition of the Election Committee appears at its face value broadly representative, this is far from the case. Apart from the 39 members of the LegCo who are returned by universal suffrage, the remaining members of the Election Committee are returned by a small number of voters. The size of the voters of each subsector is an average about 1,000, making a total size of the voters less than 240,000. Many of the subsectors comprise only corporate voters, or a majority of corporate voters, and the criteria to become a voter are entirely unclear. Thus, for example, the Fisheries and Agricultural subsector returns a total of 60 members to the Election Committee. The subsector comprises about 83 voters, all of whom are organizations. Many may look to have the same or very similar memberships, such as Aberdeen Fisherman Friendship Association, Aberdeen Fisherwomen Association, Hong Kong Fishermen’s Association and Hong Kong and Kowloon Fishermen Association Ltd. There is no clear procedure of how an organization becomes a voter. Thus, it comes as no surprise that there is no confidence that this body would be representative and would make a nomination that could represent the general view of the public. The contrive membership also means that it could easily be manipulated."

中聯辦指揮造票
唔同行業門檻唔同
二百萬黃絲個力量大唔過中聯辦無限子彈，利益輸送
黃絲個敵人唔係藍絲，係共產黨
公司票無得玩，個人票有少少機會

全國政協常委吳光正家族，透過會德豐、九倉及連卡佛等，在商界（一）、地產及建造界等9個界別登記，直接持有107票，成為功能組別的公司票「持票王」，較香港首富李嘉誠透過長和系公司登記的84票，還要多23票。

本報更發現，有財團在多達11個界別有公司成為選民，另有近年活躍政壇的富商，透過旗下財團的分公司，積極成某界別公司票選民，結果2016年選舉，其控制的公司票較上屆選舉大增4倍。

現時立法會選舉制度下，28個功能界別有18個有公司或團體票，合共有1.5萬票。財團可以透過不同子公司，登記加入不同商會，然後成為商界、工業界、零售界等不同界別選民進行投票。由於負責投票的授權代表由公司委任產生，因此財團大股東可一人控制多票。

📌強化策略 (3月起啟用)

✅全民 > 組社團 + 組工會 + 開公司
✅專業人士 > 登記專業界別
✅本身有BR > 直接登記商界
✅手足 > 掃黃店

🔺組社團 (文化界)
1. 齊集三人，須有相關文化資歷證明
2. 準備社團資料 - 宗旨/ 規章/ 擬辦活動
3. 準備個人資料 - 身分證副本/ 住址+會址證明 (3個月內)(銀行/水電煤單據)
4. 約組員出黎，互簽名，互交換文件
5. 寄出去 /親身交到警總 Done!
https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/01/blog-post_33.html

🔺組工會 (勞工界)
- 已確認核實，即使工會審批時間長短
- 只要你5月2日前提交申請, 就可以趕及2021特首選委🔥

組隊神器 7起 > https://7up.hkpetitions.com
無敵Q&A > https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/01/blog-post_12.html

🔺開公司 (萬能界)
- 帶身份證去灣仔税局搞，俾$250，30分鐘搞掂 @businessfrontier
- 輕量級 > 紡織界 $61/ 體育界 $2000/ 出版界 $1140 (撳個掣就得)
- 重量級 > 商界 $3900/ 工業界 $2970/ 零售界 $1180/ 僱主聯合會 $4800
- 集中首選 > 進出口界 $240+1320 (1年以上BR+商業地址）
https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/03/blog-post_57.html

🔺申請進出口牌 (進出口界）
只要有一年以上BR同埋商業地址，唔理你做咩生意，都可以向海關申請進出口牌，立即成為進出口界公司選民
Telegram: http://t.me/exportfrontier
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exportfrontier

🔺掃黃店 (飲食界、零售界)
組隊幫手登記 > https://forms.gle/am8LThtTL9r6joL17
掃黃店進度表 > https://bit.ly/3cEJGz6
黃店名單 > https://www.hkshoplist.com/select.php

🔺每個香港人都可以拎三票
1. 地區個人票 (地方選區有得投）
2. 功能組別個人票 (正常人係超區)
3. 功能組別團體票(不可跟2同一界別)

例子
地方選區：香港島
功能界別(個人票)：超級區議會
功能界別(團體票)：飲食界
https://electionboost.blogspot.com/2020/01/blog-post_57.html?m=1




From 功能界別公海
